QueryResult.text: SELECT SRM_RESOURCES.LAST_NAME, SRM_RESOURCES.FIRST_NAME, SRM_RESOURCES.EMAIL, SRM_RESOURCES.USER_ID, SRM_RESOURCES.IS_ACTIVE, INV_INVESTMENTS.ID PROJECT_ID FROM SRM_RESOURCES, PRTEAM, INV_INVESTMENTS WHERE PRTeam.prProjectID = INV_INVESTMENTS.ID AND SRM_RESOURCES.ID = PRTeam.prResourceID AND SRM_RESOURCES.USER_ID IS NOT NULL
